entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Aupaluk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:55 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -30.8°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 31. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 29.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 29. Wind chill near minus 45. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
